Problem Statement¶

A system to track the buyers of the output from a green energy source.

Solution¶

Platform which can provide - Provenance of Green Energy

In our current scope of this course, we focus on the provenance of energy by following transactions mentioned below

Business patterns demonstrated in our solution

Workflow utilizing that business pattern

Escrow

SecurityDeposite

IPFS

Upload/download consumer kyc related document

upload/download site architecture design doc

Oracle

Data from Smart Meters

Utility Token

Transaction flow of producing and consumption of energy flow between stakeholders
